Tapu Fini.Name: Aqua Ring

Tapu Fini.Name: Water Pulse
Tapu Fini.Description: The user attacks the target with a pulsing blast of water. This may also confuse the target.

Tapu Fini.Name: Brine
Tapu Fini.Description: If the target’s HP is half or less, this attack will hit with double the power.

Tapu Fini.Name: Defog
Tapu Fini.Description: A strong wind blows away obstacles like Reflect, Light Screen, and hazards. It also lowers the target’s evasiveness.

Tapu Fini.Name: Heal Pulse
Tapu Fini.Description: The user emits a healing pulse that restores the target’s HP by up to half of its max HP.

Tapu Fini.Name: Muddy Water

Tapu Fini.Name: Mean Look
Tapu Fini.Description: The user pins the target with a dark, arresting look. The target becomes unable to flee.

Tapu Fini.Name: Nature’s Madness

Tapu Fini.Name: Hydro Pump

Tapu Fini.Name: Soak

Tapu Fini.Name: Misty Terrain

Magearna.Name: Gyro Ball

Magearna.Name: Defense Curl

Magearna.Name: Rollout

Magearna.Name: Iron Defense
